item.title: spring-summer 2020
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: spring gods falling from the sky &ndash; water rushes spring mother : carried bags of groceries her sun babies my spirit animal found his heavenly rest : the spring robin the green samurai &ndash; approaches me with light and his stone summer equivocation : to some I’m “weird,” or even “cool” those words mean nothing

item.title: fall-winter 2019
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: fall subjects follow as queen bows her head &ndash; almost winter&rsquo;s turn flock of ducks survey centennial waters sun bids the cold

item.title: spring-summer 2019
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.description: a year into in my relationship with Parker
item.content:encoded: spring spring’s robins &ndash; seeding the university soil my heart! raw bloom &ndash; the stately robin careens chapter ends because nobody seems to remember what happened a sharp edge just begging to make a cut. the cold hurts summer the wildfire &ndash; rays leave skin red and irradiated you have commitment lacking in dialogue : or so he said slithering sweat weaves from tree to tree : spotted light lone zinnia against the mad king he stands so tall

item.title: fall-winter 2018
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: fall to her autumn means outside ball is everything grey room fits dying leaves, not how he feels winter before happened two fraternal hounds &ndash; dry yard grass no order in time&rsquo;s quanta next does not exist

item.title: kū português
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: dia quente, raro -- surpreedente em Cascais que não atrevem nadar rare, hot day -- surprising in Cascais that they don't dare swim champô aguado passo do pente pelo cabelo e chove bate a janela watery shampoo comb passes through hair and rain batters the window ondas do Tejo relaxam-me nas costas -- ventos até inverno waves of the Tejo relax me on my back -- winds to winter ventos frios acima : metais bem empregados atrás da faixa amarela cold winds above : well-employed metals behind the yellow line fumo aqui escrito no prédio : nuvens em tudo smoke here written on the building : clouds everywhere bebo do tinto enquanto olho ao branco -- Camões vacia I drink from red while looking at white -- empty Camões porém ao ver o pássaro procura na telha cinzas but upon seeing the bird search on grey tiles táxi busca gajo taxi pick up guy café tenho de o derrotar -- a primavera já coffee I have to defeat it -- spring now medusa azul nade à casa inverno vem blue jellyfish may swim home winter comes Press play below for the "medusa azul" gif!
